sense.gloss: tedious, boring, dull, uninteresting, tiresome, monotonous
to feel bored, to get bored (with), to get tired (of)
warping (of feelings, logic, etc.), distortion, twisting
leading, foremost, preeminent, outstanding, one of the best
yielding, submission, surrender, giving way, succumbing
servile, subservient, obsequious, slavish, self-abasing, grovelling, spineless
sophism, chop logic, far-fetched argument, quibble, cavil, argument for argument's sake

sdata.j: ねぇ↑遊↑↓あそ↓んでよ、とっても↑退屈↑↓たいくつ↓なの！
sdata.e: Come on, play with me, I'm so bored!

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑不屈↑↓ふくつ↓の↑精神↑↓せいしん↓で↑危機↑↓きき↓を↑切↑↓き↓り↑抜↑↓ぬ↓けられるだろう。
sdata.e: Your undaunted spirit will carry you through.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑退屈↑↓たいくつ↓そうだ。
↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑言葉↑↓ことば↓はほとんど↑屈辱↑↓くつじょく↓に↑等↑↓ひと↓しい。
sdata.e: Your remark amounts almost to insult.

sdata.j: ↑屈辱↑↓くつじょく↓を↑受↑↓う↓けて↑生↑↓い↓きるくらいなら↑死↑↓し↓んだ↑方↑↓ほう↓がましだ。
sdata.e: I would rather die than live in dishonor.

sdata.j: ↑空港↑↓くうこう↓で↑長↑↓なが↓く↑待↑↓ま↓たされたのは↑退屈↑↓たいくつ↓だった。
sdata.e: The long wait at the airport was tedious.

sdata.j: ↑近隣↑↓きんりん↓↑諸国↑↓しょこく↓は↑決↑↓けっ↓して↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑恐怖↑↓きょうふ↓↑政治↑↓せいじ↓に↑屈服↑↓くっぷく↓しなかった。
sdata.e: The neighboring countries never submitted to his terrorism.

sdata.j: ↑教師↑↓きょうし↓は↑学生↑↓がくせい↓↑達↑↓たち↓の↑要求↑↓ようきゅう↓に↑屈↑↓くっ↓した。
sdata.e: The teacher gave way to the students' demand.

sdata.j: ↑休↑↓やす↓みがつづくととても↑退屈↑↓たいくつ↓です。
sdata.e: The holiday continues to be very boring.

words.gloss: tedious, boring, dull, uninteresting, tiresome, monotonous
